Extend CloudFormation with plugins

Download Get Started

Write Native CloudFormation

Kombustion builds upon native CloudFormation, so you don't need to learn a new syntax or DSL.

Extend with Plugins

Kombustion uses plugins to preprocess and extend your CloudFormation templates.

Upgrade Incrementally

Kombustion can be adopted incrementally, instead of requiring a full rewrite of your infrastructure as code.

Decentralised Plugins

Kombustion plugins can be installed from a plugins Github repository.

Cross-Platform

Kombustion works on Linux, FreeBSD and MacOS.

License

Kombustion is absolutely free for personal or commercial use, under MIT
